Hi I'm Ian.

I am a Frontend web developer. See more about what I do in my about page.

I also have a number of personal projects on the go. See below for a highlight of my most recent work.

Site Builder

A simple CMS written with nodejs for generating static websites using a boostrap template. Used to generate the content of this site.

Crack Attack

A simple game based on Tetris Attack by Nintendo. This is an in progress HTML based remake of an exisiting open source game.

Minecraft Mapper JS

JavaScript based mapping engine for Minecraft built on THREE.js.

Rogue js

A remake of Rogue in html and javascript. This is still in the early stages of development
